eheth udayan puwathpatha uthsaha karanne me prashnayath aanduwe ginumata bara karannataya.ti.chandrasekara- kalmune nagara sabhika rahumankotin gen muslim janathawa aaraksha kala pudgalayin muslim janathawata nawatha asadharanakam sidu nokarayi.jathi bhedayak athi kirimata atham pudgalayin uthsaha daramin sitiyi.islamiya aakalpayanta patahaniwa jathi bhedayak athi kirime katayuthuwala atham islamiya sanwidhana niratha wemin sitima ratehi sulu jathiyak lesa jiwathwana muslim prajawata yahapathak nowe yayi kalmune nagara sabhawe eksath janatha nidahas peramune niyojitha ishad ee. es. rahuman prakasha karayi.ohu me sambandhayen madhyayanta nikuth kara athi wishesha niwedanaye wadiduratath sandahan kara athi karunu pahatha sandahan we.eksath bhawaya saha saubhagya pilibanda deshana karana islamiya aagamikayin kumana awasthawaka ho jathin athara mathabhedayan athiwana aakarayen deshanayan sidu nokarayi.namuth, meya dana ho nodana hindimin islamaya bihi karana bawata thamanma pawasana thawuhid sanwidhanaye ek kandayamak wisin mewani katayuthuwala niyali sitima thulin muslim prajawa wedanawata pathwi atha.thawuhid sanwidhanayata eekabaddha wi katayuthu karana nagenahira palathe pudgalayinta prashansa kala yuthuya.
